definition: A term commonly used to refer to a group of individuals who share at least one biological or adoptive parent, typically siblings. It is often used in familial contexts to describe the relationship between brothers and sisters.

examples.german: Meine Geschwister sind Ã¤lter als ich.
examples.english: My siblings are older than me.

examples.german: Sie hat zwei Geschwister, einen Bruder und eine Schwester.
examples.english: She has two siblings, a brother and a sister.

examples.german: Meine Geschwister und ich haben denselben Nachnamen.
examples.english: My siblings and I have the same last name.
